name: Raptor Racing
description:
Controls:

- Arrows to move in all directions

- R to reset from last recorded point on the track

- Run over red squares to gain a speed boost

The objective of this game is to win the race and escape from Jurassic park and become a free raptor.

Potential bugs:  

 - You might reset to 4 the position after completing a lap

 -  After finishing the game and clicking play again you may not be able to play again  so  you will have to reload the website/ game.
